contentList.content: Buoyancy
Your swimming speed is increased, and you may walk on shallow running water as if you were walking on ground.
Candlelight
A magical light follows your every move.
Dismiss Candlelight
Allow the Candlelight spell to fade.
Fortify
For the next round, you have [1], and advantage on rolls against being Frightened.
Fortified
Vero's Knock
You cause vibrations in the air that sound suspiciously like a knock, gathering the attention of enemies within [1].
Barrier

An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects whatever creature you choose to touch, including yourself. For three rounds, that creature has +5 AC, and takes no damage from Magic Missile.
An invisible barrier of magical force protects this creature, granting them +3 AC and protection from Magic Missile.
Burdening Touch
Reaching out to touch a creature, you lower their movement to 3m.
Burden
This creature has been magically burdened, dramatically lowering their movement speed.
Barrier
An invisible barrier of magical force protects this creature, granting them +3 AC and protection from Magic Missile.
Doorjam
This item has been magically locked.
Magical energy sprouts from your fingers, locking a magical object you touch.
Feather
Feather
This creature has magically had its weights lifted, increasing their movement speed and granting proficiency in Athletics.
Gust Form
This creature's movements have become one with the wind, granting them a 1d6 bonus to hit with melee attacks.
You may choose one friendly target in range. Until the end of their next turn, any melee attack they make carries the force of the wind, granting a bonus to hit of 1d6.
Magesoap
A creature you touch is cleansed of all dirt and grime. The target regains [1], and has advantage on Charisma checks.
Freshly Bathed
This creature has advantage on Charisma checks.
Oakflesh
This creature's skin is covered in bark, setting their minimum AC to 15, but rendering them vulnerable to fire.
You touch a creature, transforming their skin to a bark-like texture, Increasing their AC by 2, but rendering them weak to fire.
Sanction
Sanctioned
For the duration, whenever the creature attacks another creature, it takes [1].
Whenever the creature attacks another creature, it takes [1].
Stonefist
This creature's main hand has become stone.
One of your fists transforms into stone, allowing you to deal an unarmed attack capable of [1].
Pummel
You smash your Stone Fist into your target, dealing [1]
You feel light as a Feather. Gain Proficiency in Athletics, and +7.5 to your movement speed for the duration of the spell.
Alter Weapon

While holding a weapon, you channel Magicka into it, altering its properties: Enflame: In addition to its regular attack, your weapon now deals an additional 1d6 Fire damage. | Healing Strike: Your weapon now heals its targets for the damage it would otherwise cause. Undead targets instead take the regular amount as Radiant damage. | Static Bite: Your weapon now deals an additional 1d7 Lightning damage. | Swift Strike: You have advantage on attack rolls with this weapon. | Screaming Cleave: Your weapon now deals an additional 1d6 Thunder damage. | Viscous Tear: Regardless of the weapon's damage type, it now deals an additional 1d8 Slashing damage.
Enflame
This weapon is covered in magical fire.
While holding a weapon, you channel Magicka into it, altering its properties to deal an additional [1]
Healing Strike
This weapon may heal [1] instead of damage.
While holding a weapon, you channel Magicka into it, altering its properties to be able to Heal targets for [1], or deal Radiant damage if undead.
You may make a Weapon attack to Heal targets for [1], or deal the equivalent amount as Radiant damage to Undead targets.
Static Bite
This weapon is covered in magical electricity.
While holding a weapon, you channel Magicka into it, altering its properties to deal an additional [1].
Swift Strike
You have advantage on attack rolls.
While holding a weapon, you channel Magicka into it, altering its properties to always give you Advantage when attacking.
Screaming Cleave
This weapon is covered in magical vibrations.
While holding a weapon, you channel Magicka into it, altering its properties to deal an additional [1].
Vicious Tear
This weapon is magically sharpened.
While holding a weapon, you channel Magicka into it, altering its properties to deal an additional [1].
Batvision
This creature has Blindsight.
You touch a creature and grant it Blindsight for up to 18 turns.
Bravery
This charater has advantage on all saving throws against being Frightened.
When you cast this spell, a glittering mantle of courage settles upon a creature you touch. The target has advantage on saving throws against being frightened for the duration.
Fire Shield
A protective layer of fire weather's this creature's body, giving off light, providing Fire resistance, and lashing out at attackers.

Thin, wispy flames wreathe your body for the duration, shedding bright light, and providing you with Resistance to Fire damage. Additionally, whenever a creature within Melee range attacks you, the Shield erupts in flame, lashing out at the attacker for [1].
You can end the spell early by using an action to dismiss it.
Dismiss Fire Shield
You dismiss Fire Shield, ending the Status effect.
Frost Barrier
A protective layer of frost weather's this creature's body, protecting your body and providing Cold resistance.

Tendrils of icy air wreathe your body for the duration, reflecting light, and providing you with Resistance to Cold damage. Additionally, whenever a creature within Melee range attacks you, the barrier flings shards of ice at the attacker for [1].
Dismiss Frost Barrier
You dismiss Frost Barrier, ending the Status effect.
Hypothermia
This creature is suffering from Hypothermia.
You point at a target within range, and begin to turn its body moisture into ice. The target makes a Constitution saving throw. If the creature fails, it takes [1], and suffers Hypothermia.
At the start of each round after being affected by Hypothermia, an additional [1] of Cold Damage is applied, stacking each turn.
Lightning Shield
Snapping sparks surround this creature's body for the duration, giving light, and providing with Resistance to Lightning damage.

Snapping sparks surround your body for the duration, giving light, and providing you with Resistance to Lightning damage. Additionally, whenever a creature within Melee range attacks you, the shield electrifies your attacker for [1].
You can end the spell early by using an action to dismiss it.
Dismiss Lightning Shield
You dismiss Lightning Shield, ending the Status effect.
Lucksap

When you cast this spell, you bestow a minor curse on a creature you can see within range. That creature must make a successful Wisdom saving throw, or suffer your choice of on of the following effects for the duration: Foil: The target has disadvantage on Intelligence and Wisdom saving throws. | Fumble: The target has disadvantage on Attack rolls. | Foul: Whenever the target is attacked, they deal an extra [1].
Foil
This creature has disadvantage on Intelligence and Wisdom saving throws.
The target has disadvantage on Intelligence and Wisdom saving throws.
Fumble
This creature has disadvantage on Attack rolls.
The target has disadvantage on Attack rolls.
Foul
Whenever this creature is attacked, it takes additional damage.
Whenever the target is attacked, it takes [1].
Razorskin
This character's skin has been transformed into razor-sharp scales, increasing their AC and dealing [1] to any creature that attacks it.

You touch a creature, transforming their skin into Razor-Sharp scales. Its Armor Class can't become lower than 15, regardless of armor. In addition, any creature that attacks it with a melee attack during the duration must roll a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes [1].
On a succesful save, attackin creatures take only half as much damage.
Spellstrike
This character is able to add its Wisdom modifier for Melee and Ranged weapon attacks, and deals an additional 1d4 Force damage.
You may add your Wisdom modifier to any melee or ranged attacks you make. In addition, your attacks deal an additional [1].
Spike Growth
The ground twists and sprouts hard spikes and thorns. The area is covered in thorny vines for the duration of the spell.
